attributes.action: allow normal people who don't wish to/can't afford to subscribe to several pay channels the ability to at least see highlights of our national football team
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Pretty straight forward request.
Make it law that our national sport can be seen by the nation.
Tonights England match against Croatia was not on terrestrial TV, or even Sky, but on another pay per view service to view it live.
I would suggest that at least one terrestrial channel has to have access to the highlights of the game and is able to show them shortly after the end of the game, so that we can all share in the national game, without being fleeced in the process.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
